Name: Revival Blessing
Effect: Target One Ally. If successful, the User must spend all of their remaining Will points, if the User has no remaining Will points this Move fails. Restore conciousness and 2 HP to a fainted ally. If no Ally is fainted this Move fails. The ally does not need to be active in combat.
Description: The Pok√©mon prays to the skies with such selfless fervor and devotion that a miracle is granted.
